import React from 'react' import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' import { Container, Form, FormControl, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const NavBar = ({ handleSubmit, handleChange, handleClickLogOut, handleChangeUser, handleSubmitUser }) => { const userLoggedIn = useSelector((state) => { return state.userLoggedIn.email }) const favMovies = useSelector((state) => { return state.favouriteMovies }) return (
NR OMDB {!userLoggedIn ?
:
{`Signed in as: ${userLoggedIn}`}
}
) }
